Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.MessageFromClient

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ActivateBaseProduction
    Message from client: it notifies the server that the client has just select to use a base production power.
    ActivateCardProduction
    Message from client: it contains the deck index of the development card selected by the player in order to use its production.
    ActivateExtraProduction
    Message from client: it contains the id of the leader card selected in order to use its extra production power.
    ActivateLeaderCard
    Message from client: it contains the id of the leader card selected by the player to activate.
    ActivateProduction
    Message from client: it asks the server to activate the selected production.
    BuyDevCard
    Message from client: it contains the level, color and IDs used to buy a certain development card.
    CheatFaith  
    CheatResource  
    ChooseFirstResources
    Message from client: it contains the resources selected at the beginning of the game and where to place them.
    DiscardLeaderCard
    Message from client: it contains the leader card's ID to discard.
    DiscardResource
    Message: it contains the resource obtained by the market to discard.
    EndTurn
    Message from client: the client tries to end his turn.
    KeepLeaderCard
    Message from client: it contains the ids of the leader cards selected by the specified player at the beginning of the game.
    Login
    Message from client: it contains the nickname with the client tries to log in.
    Market
    Message from client: it contains the row/ column of the market selected by the client.
    MessageFromClient
    Message object received from the client.
    Mode
    Message from client: it contains the size of the game to create.
    MoveExtraToWarehouse
    Message from client: it contains the number of resources to move from an extra slot(indicated by an ID) to a specific shelf.
    MoveResource
    Message from client: it contains the depot shelves indexes that must be switched.
    MoveWarehouseToExtra
    Message from client: it contains the shelf from where to take resources to move to the specified extra slot indicated by the ID of the leader card that offers that power.
    PingFromClient
    Ping from client used to check if the connection is still alive with the server.
    PlaceCard
    Message from client: it contains the deck position to place the development card just bought.
    PutResPos
    Message from client: it contains the resources to place in the stocks.
    SelResIn
    Message from client: it contains the input resources for base or extra production.
    SelResOut
    Message from client: it contains the desired output resources from a base production.
    Strategy
    Message from client: it contains the id of a market strategy to use at the market to convert white marbles.
    TakeResPos
    Message from client: it contains the selected resource for payment and from where to take: strongbox, extra, depot.
